channel.title: 🏢 University of Western Australia on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Western Australia on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Referring Human Pose and Mask Estimation In the Wild
item.description: RefHuman: a new dataset and UniPHD model achieve state-of-the-art referring human pose and mask estimation in the wild, using text or positional prompts.
